Text: Does this dvd have english subtitles?
Is this the Uncut (HK) version, with English subtitles?

Does not appear to be any English subtitles. Just a selection to play the movie and another to select scenes. Don't see a setup menu anywhere... Possibly ripped out? I don't know because so little documentation comes with this d/L.

The entire menu is in Mandarin...this is for Chinese audiences only. 

It is the unrated version however.
How can one film be 5.67 Gigabytes?
Beware. file is not complete. film stopped at 112min! normal runtime should be 157min.
